ly dealt five-card hands from a standard deck. Which of the follow-
ing two hands is more likely to come up?
HAND#1HAND#2
Three of clubsAce of spades
Seven of diamondsAce of hearts
Nine of diamondsAce of clubs
Queen of heartsAce of diamonds
King of spadesKing of spades
A surprisingly large number of people will automatically say that the sec-
ond hand is much less likely than the first. Actually, if you think about it for
a bit, it should be obvious that any two specific hands have exactly the s
